title: Elementary Science Concept Understanding Design Using Participatory Visual Analogy Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pedagogical theories and general understanding of elementary science curriculum
context.additional_context: Includes strategies for utilizing digital tools to design participatory activities in online environments and managing large-scale learner groups

learning_goals: Learners can explain the theoretical foundations of PIA instructional methods (constructivism, experiential learning) and apply them to elementary science education
Learners can design online learning modules using visual analogies and puzzle-based materials and integrate them into teaching-learning processes
Learners can develop behavior pattern analysis tools to measure learner engagement in large-scale online environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
